trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element containing a collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 表示組態項目包含子項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: The ConfigurationElementCollection represents a collection of elements within a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: ConfigurationElementCollection 表示組態檔內的項目集合。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An element within a configuration file refers to a basic XML element or a section.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 組態檔內的項目是指基本的 XML 項目或一個區段。

trans-unit.source: A simple element is an XML tag with related attributes, if any.
trans-unit.target: 如果有的話，簡單的項目是與相關屬性的 XML 標記。

trans-unit.source: A simple element constitutes a section.
trans-unit.target: 簡單的項目構成區段。

trans-unit.source: Complex sections can contain one or more simple elements, a collection of elements, and other sections.
trans-unit.target: 複雜區段可以包含一或多個簡單的項目、 項目，集合和其他區段。

trans-unit.source: You use the ConfigurationElementCollection to work with a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: 您要使用的集合使用 ConfigurationElementCollection<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>物件。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>

trans-unit.source: Implement this class to add collections of custom <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> elements to a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個類別，以新增自訂<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>至<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>元素</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>的集合

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: You create a new instance of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection> when your application needs to create a custom <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>您的應用程式需要建立自訂<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>時</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>的新執行個體

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> is used to set a comparer to use.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>用來設定要使用的比較子。</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use a case-insensitive comparer to make the key case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用不區分大小寫的比較子，使索引鍵不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> comparer to use.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>使用比較子。</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: comparer is .
trans-unit.target: compareris .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to associate with the add operation in the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定名稱<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>關聯中的新增作業<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>衍生類別中覆寫。

trans-unit.source: The name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The selected value starts with the reserved prefix "config" or "lock".
trans-unit.target: 選取的值以保留的前置詞"config"或"lock 為"開頭。

trans-unit.source: Adds a configuration element to the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將加入的組態項目<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the BaseAdd method to add a new <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用 BaseAdd 方法，將新<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>至集合。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>

trans-unit.source: Override it in a derived class if custom behavior is required when the element is added.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫它在衍生類別中加入項目時，如果自訂行為需要。

trans-unit.source: When adding, an element is considered a duplicate only if the keys are identical but the values are different.
trans-unit.target: 加入時，項目視為重複索引鍵完全相同而值不相同時，才可以。

trans-unit.source: Elements with identical keys and values are accepted silently because the elements do not compete.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同索引鍵和值的項目會以無訊息模式接受，因為項目不會競爭。

trans-unit.source: However, an element with an identical key but a different value cannot be added because there is no logic to determine which of the competing values should be honored.
trans-unit.target: 但是，因為沒有邏輯可決定哪些競爭的值當中應該接受，不能新增具有完全相同的索引鍵而不同值的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: Adds a configuration element to the configuration element collection.
trans-unit.target: 將組態項目加入至組態項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the optional parameter `throwIfExists` to throw an <xref:System.Exception> exception if the specified <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> object already exists in the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用選擇性參數`throwIfExists`擲回<xref:System.Exception>例外狀況如果指定<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>物件已經存在於<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>集合。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: An element is considered a duplicate only if the keys are identical but the values are different.
trans-unit.target: 只有當索引鍵完全相同而值不項目視為重複。

trans-unit.source: Elements with identical keys and values are accepted silently because the elements do not compete.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同索引鍵和值的項目會以無訊息模式接受，因為項目不會競爭。

trans-unit.source: However, an element with an identical key but a different value cannot be added because there is no logic to determine which of the competing values should be honored.
trans-unit.target: 但是，因為沒有邏輯可決定哪些競爭的值當中應該接受，不能新增具有完全相同的索引鍵而不同值的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to throw an exception if the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> specified is already contained in the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果擲回例外狀況<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>指定已經包含在<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The to add already exists in the and the throwIfExists parameter is .
trans-unit.target: 加入已存在於和 throwIfExists 參數是 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a configuration element to the configuration element collection.
trans-unit.target: 將組態項目加入至組態項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the `index` parameter to add the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> object to the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection> at a specific index location.
trans-unit.target: 使用`index`要加入參數<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>物件<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>在特定的索引位置。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>

trans-unit.source: The index location at which to add the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入指定的索引位置<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: Removes all configuration element objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除所有的組態項目物件。

trans-unit.source: When the BaseClear method is called, it removes all <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: BaseClear 方法呼叫時，它會移除所有<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>從集合的物件。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>

trans-unit.source: It also inserts a `clear` directive into the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 它也會插入`clear`指示詞至組態檔。

trans-unit.source: Gets the configuration element at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: 取得位於指定的索引位置的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: The index location of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to return.
trans-unit.target: 索引位置的<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>傳回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref>指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: Returns the configuration element with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之索引鍵的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: The BaseGet method returns `null` if there is no <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> object with the specified key in the collection.
trans-unit.target: BaseGet 方法會傳回`null`如果沒有任何<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>物件與集合中指定的索引鍵。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>

trans-unit.source: The key of the element to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回之項目的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> with the specified key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref>具有指定索引鍵，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the keys for all of the configuration elements contained in the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回陣列的所有組態項目中所包含的索引鍵<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the keys for all of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects contained in the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，其中包含的索引鍵的所有<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>所包含的物件<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key for the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: 取得的索引鍵<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>位於指定的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The index location for the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 索引位置<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The key for the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引鍵<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the index of the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指出指定的索引<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> for the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref>的指定的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref>，否則為-1。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> with the specified key has been removed from the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>具有指定索引鍵已經移除了<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The key of the element to check.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查的項目索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> with the specified key has been removed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>具有指定索引鍵已被移除，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>從集合。

trans-unit.source: The BaseRemove method inserts a `<remove>` directive into the configuration file for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: BaseRemove 方法插入`<remove>`指示詞的組態檔至<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>具有指定索引鍵。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>

trans-unit.source: The key of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>移除。

trans-unit.source: No <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> with the specified key exists in the collection, the element has already been removed, or the element cannot be removed because the value of its <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty.Type*> is not <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 否<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>具有指定索引鍵存在於集合中、 已移除項目，或無法移除項目，因為值其<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty.Type*>不<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType"> </xref>。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty.Type*>

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>位於指定的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The BaseRemoveAt method inserts a `<remove>` directive into the configuration file for the element at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: BaseRemoveAt 方法插入`<remove>`指示詞至組態檔，指定的索引位置處的項目。

trans-unit.source: The index location of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 索引位置的<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>移除。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name for the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to associate with the clear operation in the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的名稱<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>關聯中的清除作業<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>衍生類別中覆寫。

trans-unit.source: The name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The selected value starts with the reserved prefix "config" or "lock".
trans-unit.target: 選取的值以保留的前置詞"config"或"lock 為"開頭。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得型別<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The type will be either a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType> or an <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType> field.
trans-unit.target: 型別會<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType>或<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType>欄位。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType>.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType"></xref> of this collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType"> </xref>此集合。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> to an array.
trans-unit.target: 複製的內容<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>到陣列。

trans-unit.source: Array to which to copy the contents of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的內容至陣列<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Index location at which to begin copying.
trans-unit.target: 要開始複製處的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會建立新<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Override the CreateNewElement method to create custom <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> objects of a specific type.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 CreateNewElement 方法來建立自訂<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>特定類型的物件。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>

trans-unit.source: When a collection is loaded from the configuration file, CreateNewElement is called to create individual elements.
trans-unit.target: 從組態檔載入集合時，會呼叫 CreateNewElement 建立個別項目。

trans-unit.source: CreateNewElement must be overridden in classes that derive from the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: CreateNewElement 必須衍生自<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>類別</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>的類別中覆寫

trans-unit.source: A newly created <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新建立<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>衍生類別中覆寫。

trans-unit.source: Override the CreateNewElement method to create custom <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> objects of a specific type.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 CreateNewElement 方法來建立自訂<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>特定類型的物件。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>

trans-unit.source: When a collection is loaded from the configuration file, CreateNewElement is called to create individual elements.
trans-unit.target: 從組態檔載入集合時，會呼叫 CreateNewElement 建立個別項目。

trans-unit.source: CreateNewElement must be overridden in classes that derive from the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: CreateNewElement 必須衍生自<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>類別</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>的類別中覆寫

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to create.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>來建立。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> with a specified name.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>具有指定名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name used to identify this collection of elements in the configuration file when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來識別此衍生類別中覆寫組態檔中的項目集合的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Override the ElementName property to name a custom <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫來命名自訂<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection> ElementName 屬性

trans-unit.source: The name of the collection; otherwise, an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 名稱的集合。否則為空字串。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the collection has been cleared.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定是否清除集合。

trans-unit.source: Setting the EmitClear property to `true` causes a `<clear>` directive to be written to the configuration file when the collection is serialized.
trans-unit.target: EmitClear 屬性設定為`true`導致`<clear>`序列化集合時，要寫入至組態檔的指示詞。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection has been cleared; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已清除集合。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The configuration is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 設定為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Compares the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 比較<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>到指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object to compare with is equal to the current <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要相比較的物件是否等於目前<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>執行個體; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element key for a specified configuration element when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之組態項目衍生類別中覆寫項目索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to return the key for.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref>来傳回的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that acts as the key for the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，可做為指定的索引鍵<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> which is used to iterate through the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>用來逐一查看<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> which is used to iterate through the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>用來逐一查看<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique value representing the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得唯一的值，表示<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A unique value representing the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> current instance.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的值，表示<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>目前執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> exists in the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否指定<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>存在於<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Override the IsElementName method to provide custom behavior.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 IsElementName 方法以提供自訂行為。

trans-unit.source: The name of the element to verify.
trans-unit.target: 若要確認的項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element exists in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目存在於集合中。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> can be removed from the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否指定<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>可以從移除<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Query IsElementRemovable before removing a collection element.
trans-unit.target: 查詢 IsElementRemovable 之前移除集合的項目。

trans-unit.source: The element to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> can be removed from this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>可以從這個移除<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> has been modified since it was last saved or loaded when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否此<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>自上次儲存或當在衍生類別中覆寫時，載入後已修改。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.IsModified%2A> method of any <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> contained within a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection> returns `true`, the IsModified method of the entire collection returns `true` as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.IsModified%2A>方法的任何<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>內含<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>傳回`true`，整個集合的 IsModified 方法會傳回`true`也。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.IsModified%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if any contained element has been modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已修改任何包含的項目。否則，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> object is read only.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>物件唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The system defines configuration elements that cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 系統會定義組態項目，無法修改。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to determine whether elements can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法來判斷是否可以修改項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> object is read only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>物件讀取否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示是否同步化存取集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> is synchronized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果存取<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>已同步處理，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Causes the configuration system to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 會使組態系統會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The OnDeserializeUnrecognizedElement is called when an unrecognized configuration element is read from a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 從組態檔讀取的無法辨識的組態項目時，會呼叫 OnDeserializeUnrecognizedElement。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to provide custom handling of unrecognized configuration elements from a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法以提供自訂處理無法辨識的組態項目從組態檔。

trans-unit.source: The default return value, `false`, causes the configuration system to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 預設的傳回值， `false`，會使組態系統會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The name of the unrecognized element.
trans-unit.target: 無法辨識的項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: An input stream that reads XML from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 從組態檔讀取 XML 輸入資料流。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the unrecognized element was deserialized successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果無法辨識的項目還原序列化順利啟動。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The element specified in elementName is the element.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的項目 elementName 是項目。

trans-unit.source: elementName starts with the reserved prefix "config" or "lock".
trans-unit.target: elementName以保留的前置詞"config"或"lock 為"開頭。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to associate with the remove operation in the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定名稱<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>關聯中移除作業<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>衍生類別中覆寫。

trans-unit.source: The name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The selected value starts with the reserved prefix "config" or "lock".
trans-unit.target: 選取的值以保留的前置詞"config"或"lock 為"開頭。

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> to its unmodified state when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 重設<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>為衍生類別中覆寫時，其未修改狀態。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior for the Reset method is to clear any modified elements a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection> object contains and to set the modified elements to the values specified by their parent configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Reset 方法的預設行為是清除任何修改過的項目<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>物件包含與設定已修改的元素的值由其父組態檔。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>

trans-unit.source: If any element in the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection> has child elements, Reset is also called on those child elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果在任何項目<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>項目子系、 重設也同樣會呼叫這些子項目。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> representing the collection parent element, if any; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref>代表集合的父項目，如有任何項目; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Resets the value of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.IsModified*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 值重設<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.IsModified*>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>衍生類別中覆寫時</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.IsModified*>

trans-unit.source: The ResetModified method determines whether the elements of this collection will be written to the configuration file when the configuration is updated.
trans-unit.target: ResetModified 方法會決定是否此集合的項目會寫入至組態檔更新的組態。

trans-unit.source: Writes the configuration data to an XML element in the configuration file when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，在組態檔中的 XML 項目，將組態資料。

trans-unit.source: The SerializeElement method writes the contents of the configuration elements contained in the collection and any nested elements they contain to the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: SerializeElement 方法會將集合中包含的組態項目和任何巢狀項目，它們包含的內容寫入組態檔。

trans-unit.source: Override SerializeElement to provide a custom write procedure out of the collection contents and nested elements.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 SerializeElement 提供現成可用的集合內容和巢狀項目寫入自訂程序。

trans-unit.source: Output stream that writes XML to the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 寫入 XML 組態檔的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to serialize the collection key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要序列化的集合索引鍵。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> was written to the configuration file successfully.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>已成功寫入至組態檔。

trans-unit.source: One of the elements in the collection was added or replaced and starts with the reserved prefix "config" or "lock".
trans-unit.target: 其中一個集合中的項目已加入或取代，以保留的前置詞"config"或"lock 為"開頭。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.IsReadOnly*> property for the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> object and for all sub-elements.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.IsReadOnly*>屬性<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>物件與所有子項目。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: This method is used internally to set aside those system configuration elements that cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是在內部用來設定無法修改這些系統的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: To determine which elements are modifiable, call the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷哪些項目是可修改，請呼叫<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.IsReadOnly%2A>方法。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來同步存取的物件<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An object used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 用來同步存取的物件<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> to an array.
trans-unit.target: 複製<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>到陣列。

trans-unit.source: Array to which to copy this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要複製至陣列<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Index location at which to begin copying.
trans-unit.target: 要開始複製處的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether an attempt to add a duplicate <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> will cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否將重複嘗試<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>至<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>會導致擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When you add a duplicate element, an exception is thrown if the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.CollectionType%2A> value of the element is either <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType> or <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType>.
trans-unit.target: 當您新增重複的項目時，如果將擲回例外狀況的<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.CollectionType%2A>項目的值是其中一個<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType>或<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType>.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.CollectionType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that elements with identical keys and values are not considered duplicates, and are accepted silently.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，具有相同索引鍵和值的項目不會被視為重複項目，會以無訊息模式接受。

trans-unit.source: Only elements with identical keys but different values are considered duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的項目具有相同索引鍵而不同的值會被視為重複。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks section for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.BaseAdd%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.BaseAdd%2A>方法。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.BaseAdd%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an attempt to add a duplicate <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> to this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> will cause an exception to be thrown; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果嘗試加入重複<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>至此<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref>會導致例外狀況會擲回，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Reverses the effect of merging configuration information from different levels of the configuration hierarchy
trans-unit.target: 回復從組態階層架構的不同層級合併組態資訊的效果

trans-unit.source: The Unmerge method reverses the effect of merging configuration information from different levels of the configuration hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Unmerge 方法會回復從組態階層架構的不同層級合併組態資訊的效果。

trans-unit.source: This allows configuration set at the current hierarchy level to be differentiated from that set at parent levels, before serialization.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓在目前的階層層級的序列化之前的父層級設定為與不同的組態集。

trans-unit.source: Unmerge is called by the system on a new temporary element to compare the parent object and the source object.
trans-unit.target: 取消合併會呼叫新的暫存項目，以比較父物件與來源物件上的系統。

trans-unit.source: Based on the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode> value, it then sets the temporary object to contain the data that needs to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 根據<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode>值，然後將暫存物件，以包含必須序列化的資料。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode>

trans-unit.source: For details about save modes, see <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資料儲存模式，請參閱<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode>.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object at the current level containing a merged view of the properties.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref>物件目前層級包含屬性的合併的檢視。

trans-unit.source: The parent <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object of the current element, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this is the top level.
trans-unit.target: 父代<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>物件目前的項目，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果這是最上層。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode"></xref> enumerated value that determines which property values to include.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode"> </xref>列舉值，決定要包含哪些屬性值。
